<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2050</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Primary literature as a basis for a high-school biology curriculum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Primärliteratur als Grundlage für einen High 
School Biologielehrplan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littérature primaire comme base pour un 
programme d'études de biologie de lycée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Literatura preliminar como uma base para um 
curriculum da biologia da High School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Letteratura primaria come base per un programma 
di studi di biologia della High School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχική λογοτεχνία ως βάση για ένα πρόγραμμα σπουδών 
της υψηλός-σχολικής βιολογίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Literatura primaria como base para un plan de 
estudios de la biología de la High School secundaria</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This article desribes how the authors tried to use primary literature as the means of developing scientific literacy among high school biology majors.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">primary literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">article</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Artikel desribes, wie die Autoren 
versuchten, Primärliteratur als die Mittel des Entwickelns des 
wissenschaftlichen Bildungsgrades unter High School Biologiemajoren zu
benutzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Desribes de cet article comment les auteurs ont 
essayé d'utiliser la littérature primaire comme moyens de 
développer l'instruction scientifique parmi des commandants de 
biologie de lycée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desribes deste artigo como os autores tentaram 
usar a literatura preliminar como os meios de desenvolver o literacy 
científico entre majores da biologia da High School.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Desribes di questo articolo come gli autori hanno
provato ad usare la letteratura primaria come i mezzi di sviluppare il
literacy scientifico fra i maggiori di biologia della High School.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το άρθρο desribes πώς οι συντάκτες 
προσπάθησαν να χρησιμοποιήσουν την αρχική λογοτεχνία ως μέσα την 
επιστημονική βασική εκπαίδευση μεταξύ των ταγματαρχών της 
βιολογίας γυμνασίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Desribes de este artículo cómo los autores 
intentaron utilizar la literatura primaria como los medios de 
desarrollar la instrucción científica entre comandantes de la 
biología de la High School secundaria.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Primärliteratur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Artikel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
